resources.string: 2008 IS Code contains intact stability criteria for the marine vehicles of _____ in length and above.
Passenger ships need to check SOLAS Probabilistic Damage Stability. Passenger ships are ships which carry more than ____ passengers.
Oil tankers of ____ dwt and above shall comply with regulation 27 of Annex I to MARPOL 73/78.
To be dispensed from an inclining test, the deviation of lightship mass is not to exceed, x% of the lightship mass of the lead ship.
for intermediate L: by linear interpolation.
50m ASD Tug with 15 special persons need to check the following stability criteria. Check them all apply.
